General.Name: Daishin Balance No. 7 Special Purpose Acquisition Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Daishin Balance No.7 Special Purpose Acquisition Co., Ltd. focuses on listing on the KOSDAQ market of the Korea Stock Exchange and merge with another company. The company was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Daishin Finance Center, Seoul, South Korea
